typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSSource
ADLSSource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSelectTransformation
SelectSelectTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> CasheSink
